There are several scenes where the camera pans over some parts of buildings, but nothing else seems to make sense. Most of these scenes seem to have been shot at night, rather than during the day. All in all, the movie should be avoided at all costs. If you are looking for something a little different, skip this one. Otherwise, don't bother with it. 1/2 out of 10.
